physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Mr K has difficulty controlling his oral secretions, and his speech is intelligible but significantly different from his former pattern.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The significant pain he experienced from the radiation therapy, including burns around the chin and neck, ulcers on his lips, and bleeding in his mouth, have all abated.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Mr K underwent significant physical changes including loss of nearly 20 pounds due to his condition and treatments.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The condition has improved as he has returned to part-time work and is able to live independently.
